content: Kindly avoid making unnecessary discussions about the bonuses and promotions.As the time is passing by, the competition between the gambling sites has increased significantly. Online betting has gained huge popularity now. As a result, every casino runs various promotions and gives lot's of bonuses to the users to keep them active. Each casino/bookie has their own view in this section, gamblers have their own choice too. I have collected the informations and made a list of the available bonuses and promotions of the casinos and sportsbook.- The information is collected from the promotions, loyalty bonus and VIP club page of each gambling site.- Don't hesitate to give an update here if I have missed to add any regular bonuses of a casino.- The list has been made in alphabetical order.┏━━━━━━━━━━┳━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┓┃Casino Name┃Type of Available Bonuses┃┣━━━━━━━━━━╋━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┫┃BC.game┃Deposit Bonus, Level up Bonus, Rakeback, Recharge, Weekly, Monthly, ShitCode, Task Reward, Daily Race┃┃┃Daily & Weekly Quests, Few more bonuses available at higher VIP rank. User need to meet the wagering/rollover requirements to use those bonus money freely.• Unconditional Bonuses: Level/Rank Up Bonus, Daily, Weekly, Monthly Cashback, Rakeback, Lucky Spin etc.There are no strings attached with this type of bonuses. User can use those bonus amount freely.• Promotions: Most of the promotions reward has no wagering requirement. Wager Contest prize, Lottery Draw prize, Giveaway and Challenges prize. Few exceptional promotions reward has 1× rollover requirement.Bitcointalk Exclusive Promo: Some casinos and sportsbooks are running exclusive promotion or giveaway for bitcointalk forum members on a regular basis. As example: Bitcasino, Sportsbet, etc. Keep your eyes on Games and rounds to get updates about them.Each bonus and promotion has it's own terms. This list doesn't contain the detailed information of the bonuses and promotions. Click on the ‘details’ link to know the terms about those bonuses.Compulsive gambler? Take help: BeGambleAware, QuitGamble

comments.author: famososMuertos
comments.body: Quote from: Mahdirakib on July 08, 2022, 08:55:30 AM...//...::+1I would like to say that in the case of Bc.Game, the faucet (wheel) offers rewards and Bonuses, the first goes directly to your wallet, that is, you can use it without conditions, the second has a requirement.In that sense, reward and bonus falls into the category; "Promotions"Loyalty and promotions are two different things. In general, I prefer the rewards, payouts offered by loyalty. If I had to decide on a casino, I would not look so much at its promotions (which is important) I would review the loyalty program very well.That's why to your OP, if you allow me the suggestion, because already it is a great job that you have done, but you should add the Loyalty column.Quote from: Note3 on July 08, 2022, 09:20:58 AMThere must be gambling websites or other casinos that also have loyalty bonuses or promotions but you haven't listed them yet, my question is have you tried all the promotions from the casinos on your list?, just curiousIn my case I appreciate that list, because it is a good summary of where to go, if you read well, nowhere does  say "reviews" that in that case if he should go to a casino to deposit and play, I think that the task now as a community is to provide information about each of those loyalty payments and promotions that the OP investigated.

comments.author: Mr.right85
comments.body: Quote from: Mahdirakib on July 08, 2022, 08:54:58 AMKindly avoid making unnecessary discussions about the bonuses and promotions.Each bonus and promotion has it's own terms. This list doesn't contain the detailed information of the bonuses and promotions. This is sme promotional strategy tha have helped boost a lot of casinos and as well, has come to crumble other casinos that doesn't give proper terms to the way there bonuses are earned and utilised. This is the most abused part of an online casino's activities as it often comes with loopholes of which, greedy users are bound to exploit.It's also a way to trap the loyalty of your customers as these promotions is sure to increase patronage and you've got to prove that you are the better and offers more to the minions out there. When these is what keeps them, its always best to have these terms properly spelt out so it could cut off a lot of abuse on the system.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Great work with this collection Mahdirakib. If you run out of names or you are unsure what casinos to add, feel free to take a look at my collections where you have made significant contributions yourself by suggesting good platforms.Quote from: Note3 on July 08, 2022, 09:20:58 AMThere must be gambling websites or other casinos that also have loyalty bonuses or promotions but you haven't listed them yet, my question is have you tried all the promotions from the casinos on your list?, just curious It's really irrelevant if OP tried all these bonuses and promotions himself. It's unlikely that he did considering how many there are and how many more will be added in the future at one time or another. It's a list of what is available out there and if you are interested, you can check out what seems appealing to you personally.Quote from: Agbe on July 08, 2022, 09:48:02 PMThis is nice, but the list is too small because most gambling sites that I know are not in the list. GXGBET, BECH.games and etc are not found in the table.  GXGBet is brand-new and relatively unknown. I am generally cautious about new sites. It's name isn't BECH.games, it's BCH.games.

comments.body: Now that`s a very nice thread sir - you wouldn't be available for GOSU content creation, would you?   Wolf.Bet has not only introduced level up bonuses by the way, people may also qualify for weekly VIP bonuses which are made available each Friday.

comments.author: Uang_kartal
comments.body: a new trend (which I know in my environment) in playing and entertainment, especially sportsbooks. this type of game sometimes becomes a necessity for certain people who like it. it will be difficult to find a favorite sportsbook if you try one by one with a limited cash deposit.these sites will take an adventurer in search of a suitable and well-paying bonus or welcome.with a review like this (tread) will cut someone off for further research on their own quite well.for those who are ready with capital, it might not be too heavy if you try one by one and maybe it can be a good additional signal from what you say.so informative that users will be interested in the links and references you share.I think the growth of sportsbooks, both other games, is also increasing day by day as it develops online and quickly.with us getting to know these sites new people can weigh from anyone's references on a clear basis.
